languages.text: Провиант исчез в очистительном пламени в считанные мгновения — гораздо быстрее, чем все ожидали. Уши экипажа заложило от пронзительного визга, и от сгоревших продуктов не осталось даже пепла. Корабельные экклезиархи осенили место священными знаками, но другие члены экипажа решили, что порча была лишь иллюзией.

traits.locale_text: Провиант исчез в очистительном пламени в считанные мгновения — гораздо быстрее, чем все ожидали. Уши экипажа заложило от пронзительного визга, и от сгоревших продуктов не осталось даже пепла. Корабельные экклезиархи осенили место священными знаками, но другие члены экипажа решили, что порча была лишь иллюзией.

languages.text: The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.
languages.original_text: Провиант исчез в очистительном пламени в считанные мгновения — гораздо быстрее, чем все ожидали. Уши экипажа заложило от пронзительного визга, и от сгоревших продуктов не осталось даже пепла. Корабельные экклезиархи осенили место священными знаками, но другие члены экипажа решили, что порча была лишь иллюзией.

traits.locale_text: The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than everyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the burned victuals vanished without leaving behind even a pinch of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the burned victuals vanished without leaving behind even a pinch of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.

The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.

The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.

languages.text: 净化的烈焰瞬间吞噬了被污染的食物，速度远超所有人的预料。船员们耳边响起了一声痛苦的尖啸，随后，被烧焦的粮食就消失得无影无踪，连一丝灰烬都没有留下。船上的神职人员用神圣的印记消除这间舱室内的诅咒，但其余船员则认为先前的污染仅仅是幻觉而已。
languages.original_text: The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.

traits.locale_text: 净化的烈焰瞬间吞噬了被污染的食物，速度远超所有人的预料。船员们耳边响起了一声痛苦的尖啸，随后，被烧焦的粮食就消失得无影无踪，连一丝灰烬都没有留下。船上的神职人员用神圣的印记消除这间舱室内的诅咒，但其余船员则认为先前的污染仅仅是幻觉而已。

languages.text: La llama purificadora consumió las provisiones en un instante, mucho más rápido de lo que nadie esperaba. Los oídos de la tripulación emitieron un chillido de dolor y las provisiones chamuscadas desaparecieron sin dejar ni rastro de ceniza. Los eclesiásticos de la nave consagraron el compartimento con signos sagrados, pero el resto de los soldados del vacío decidieron que la contaminación no había sido más que una ilusión.
languages.original_text: The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.

traits.locale_text: La llama purificadora consumió las provisiones en un instante, mucho más rápido de lo que nadie esperaba. Los oídos de la tripulación emitieron un chillido de dolor y las provisiones chamuscadas desaparecieron sin dejar ni rastro de ceniza. Los eclesiásticos de la nave consagraron el compartimento con signos sagrados, pero el resto de los soldados del vacío decidieron que la contaminación no había sido más que una ilusión.

languages.text: 予想を上回るほど速く、浄化の炎は一瞬で食料を焼き尽くした。クルーの耳には悲鳴がガンガンと反響して、焼け焦げた貯蔵品は灰の残りカスもなく姿を消す。船の上位聖職者は聖なる印で室内を浄化したものの、他のヴォイズマンは、汚染はただの幻想だったと判断した。
languages.original_text: The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.

traits.locale_text: 予想を上回るほど速く、浄化の炎は一瞬で食料を焼き尽くした。クルーの耳には悲鳴がガンガンと反響して、焼け焦げた貯蔵品は灰の残りカスもなく姿を消す。船の上位聖職者は聖なる印で室内を浄化したものの、他のヴォイズマンは、汚染はただの幻想だったと判断した。

languages.text: Les flammes purifient instantanément les provisions, bien plus rapidement que ce à quoi l'on pourrait s'attendre. Un cri strident retentit dans tout le vaisseau et les réserves calcinées disparaissent sans laisser de traces. Les ecclésiastiques consacrent le compartiment à grands coups de signes sacrés, mais les cosmomarins pensent que la contamination n'est probablement qu'une simple illusion.
languages.original_text: The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.

traits.locale_text: Les flammes purifient instantanément les provisions, bien plus rapidement que ce à quoi l'on pourrait s'attendre. Un cri strident retentit dans tout le vaisseau et les réserves calcinées disparaissent sans laisser de traces. Les ecclésiastiques consacrent le compartiment à grands coups de signes sacrés, mais les cosmomarins pensent que la contamination n'est probablement qu'une simple illusion.

languages.text: Die läuternden Flammen verschlingen die Vorräte augenblicklich, viel schneller, als irgendjemand erwartet hatte. Der Crew dröhnt ein lauter Schmerzensschrei in den Ohren, und die verbrannten Vorräte verschwinden, ohne dass die kleinste Spur Arsche zurückbleibt. Die Ekklesiarchen des Schiffs weihen den Vorratsraum mit heiligen Zeichen, doch die übrigen Raumfahrer sind sich sicher, dass die Kontamination nur eine Illusion war.
languages.original_text: The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.

Der Crew dröhnt ein lauter Schmerzensschrei in den Ohren, und die verbrannten Vorräte verschwinden, ohne dass die kleinste Spur Arsche zurückbleibt. Die Ekklesiarchen des Schiffs weihen den Vorratsraum mit heiligen Zeichen, doch die übrigen Raumfahrer sind sich sicher, dass die Kontamination nur eine Illusion war.

languages.text: Arındırıcı alevler, erzakları tahmin edilenden çok daha hızlı bir şekilde tüketti. Mürettebatın kulaklarında acı dolu bir çığlık yankılandı ve yanmış erzaklar, geride bir kül izi bile bırakmadan kayboldu. Gemideki ekleşiarklar, kompartımanı kutsal işaretlerle kutsadı. Kalan uçsuz erleri ise bu bozulmanın yalnızca bir yanılsama olduğuna karar verdi.
languages.original_text: The purifying flame consumed the provisions in an instant, much faster than anyone expected. The crew's ears rang with a pained shriek and the scorched stores vanished without so much as a trace of ash. The vessel's ecclesiarchs consecrated the compartment with holy signs, but the rest of the voidsmen decided that the contamination had been nothing more than an illusion.
